description: Manage custom hostnames of Functions of the static app.

commands.name: az staticwebapp hostname delete
commands.summary: Delete given hostname of the static app.
examples: az staticwebapp hostname delete -n MyStaticAppName --hostname HostnameToDelete

commands.name: az staticwebapp hostname list
commands.summary: List custom hostnames of the static app.

commands.name: az staticwebapp hostname set
commands.summary: Set given sub-domain hostname to the static app. Please configure CNAME/TXT/ALIAS record with your DNS provider. Use --no-wait to not wait for validation.
examples: az staticwebapp hostname set -n MyStaticAppName --hostname www.example.com
az staticwebapp hostname set -n MyStaticAppName --hostname example.com --validation-method "dns-txt-token"

commands.name: az staticwebapp hostname show
commands.summary: Get details for a staticwebapp custom domain. Can be used to fetch validation token for TXT domain validation (see example).
examples: az staticwebapp hostname show -n MyStaticAppName -g MyResourceGroup --hostname example.com --query "validationToken"
az staticwebapp hostname show -n MyStaticAppName -g MyResourceGroup --hostname example.com
